functions.name: printTab
functions.description: print tab by tabId, optional window id or current tab window with specified settings.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: Tab id to be printed or current.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: frameId to be printed or main window.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Called after browser print method is called.

jobId.description: The id of processed print job.

functions.name: getDefaultPrinterName
functions.description: Returns the name of default printer.

functions.name: getPrintSettings
functions.description: Returns print settings for printer. If printerName is null, settings for default printer will be returned.

functions.name: savePrintSettings
functions.description: Save print settings for printer and return them.

parameters.name: setDefaultPrinterName
parameters.description: Sets default printer name to that printer.

types.description: The page settings including: orientation, scale, background, margins, headers, footers.

orientation.description: The page content orientation: 0 = portrait, 1 = landscape. Default: 0.

scaling.description: The page content scaling factor: 1.0 = 100% = normal size. Default: 1.0.

shrinkToFit.description: Whether the page content should shrink to fit the page width (overrides scaling). Default: true.

printBGColors.description: Whether the page background colors should be shown. Default: false.

printBGImages.description: Whether the page background images should be shown. Default: false.

printInColor.description: Print in color. false means in grayscale. Default: true.

printReversed.description: Print pages in reverse order. Default: false.

toFileName.description: Output file name in cas of 'printToFile'.

printRange.description: What content to print 0 = print all pages, 1 = print specified range between startPageRange and endPageRange, 2 = print selection, 3 = print focused frame. Default: 0.

paperName.description: The name of paper (for some platforms like Linux).

paperData.description: The id of paper (for some platforms like Windows).

paperSizeUnit.description: The page size unit: 0 = inches, 1 = millimeters. Default: 0.

paperWidth.description: The paper width in paper size units. Default: 8.5.

paperHeight.description: The paper height in paper size units. Default: 11.0.

outputFormat.description: Print output format. 0 = Native format, 1 = Postscript, 2 = PDF. Default: 0.

headerStrLeft.description: The text for the page's left header. Default: '&T'.

headerStrCenter.description: The text for the page's center header. Default: ''.

headerStrRight.description: The text for the page's right header. Default: '&U'.

footerStrLeft.description: The text for the page's left footer. Default: '&PT'.

footerStrCenter.description: The text for the page's center footer. Default: ''.

footerStrRight.description: The text for the page's right footer. Default: '&D'.

unwriteableMarginLeft.description: The unwriteable margin between the printable area and the left edge of the paper (inches). Default: 0.

unwriteableMarginRight.description: The unwriteable margin between the printable area and the right edge of the paper (inches). Default: 0.

unwriteableMarginTop.description: The unwriteable margin between the printable area and the top edge of the paper (inches). Default: 0.

unwriteableMarginBottom.description: The unwriteable margin between the printable area and the bottom edge of the paper (inches). Default: 0.

edgeLeft.description: The offset between header/footer and the left unwriteable margin (inches). Default: 0.3.

edgeRight.description: The offset between header/footer and the right unwriteable margin (inches). Default: 0.3.

edgeTop.description: The offset between header and the top unwriteable margin (inches). Default: 0.3.

edgeBottom.description: The offset between footer and the bottom unwriteable margin (inches). Default: 0.3.

marginLeft.description: The margin between the page content and the left unwriteable margin (inches). Default: 0.5.

marginRight.description: The margin between the page content and the right unwriteable margin (inches). Default: 0.5.

marginTop.description: The margin between the page content and the top unwriteable margin (inches). Default: 0.5.

marginBottom.description: The margin between the page content and the bottom unwriteable margin (inches). Default: 0.5.

jobId.description: The id of the print job that state was changed.

tabId.description: The id of tab initiated print job.

frameId.description: The id of frame initiated print job.

stateFlags.description: Flags indicating the new state. This value is a combination of one of the State Transition Flags and one or more of the State Type Flags defined above. Any undefined bits are reserved for future use.

status.description: Error status code associated with the state change. This parameter should be ignored unless aStateFlags includes the STATE_STOP bit. The status code indicates success or failure of the request associated with the state change.

jobId.description: The id of the print job that state was changed.

tabId.description: The id of tab initiated print job.

frameId.description: The id of frame initiated print job.

curTotalProgress.description: The current progress for all requests associated with aWebProgress.

maxTotalProgress.description: The total progress for all requests associated with aWebProgress.

jobId.description: The id of the print job that state was changed.

tabId.description: The id of tab initiated print job.

frameId.description: The id of frame initiated print job.

status.description: This value is not an error code. Instead, it is a numeric value that indicates the current status of the request. This interface does not define the set of possible status codes.
